lines.gurmukhi: jYsy qO kMcnY pwro prsq soK lyq Agin mY fwry pun pwro auf jwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Tau Kanchanai Paaro Parasat Sokh Layta , Agani Mai Daaray Poun Paaro Ud Jaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as mercury touching gold conceals its real colour but when put in a crucible regains its luster, while the mercury evaporates.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy ml mUqR lg AMbr mlIn hoq swbn sill imil inrml gwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Mal Mootr Lag Anbar Maleen Hota , Saaban Salil Mili Niramal Gaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as clothes become dirty with filth and dust but when washed with soap and water become clean again.

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy Aih gRsy ibK bRXwpq sgl AMg mMqR kY ibKY ibkwr sB su iblwq hY
lines.transliteration_english: Jaisay Ahi Grasay Bikh Byaapat Sagal Anga , Mantr Kai Bikhai Bikaar Sabh Su Bilaat Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Just as snake-bite spreads poison in the whole body but with recitation of Garur jaap (a Mantra) all ill effects are destroyed.

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy mwXw moh kY ibmohq mgn mn gur aupdys mwXw mUl murJwq hY ]557]
lines.transliteration_english: Taisay Maayaa Moh Kai Bimohat Magan Mana , Gur Oupadays Maayaa Mool Murajhaat Hai ?557?

Shabad OS B.translation: Similarly by listening to True Guru's word and meditating on it, all the effects of worldly vices and attachment are eliminated. (All the influence of worldly things (Maya) ends.)  (557)
